game.multiplayer.game
Interface Game

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameImpl
public interface Game
extends java.rmi.Remote

This interface represents the Game of the Remote Interface for the WordMoleServer.

Author:
Chris Barton

Method Summary
 Game getGame()
          Returns the current Game
 void register(Client client, MultiplayerGameFrame mult, boolean connected)
          Registers a client that joins or leaves the Game.
 void updateScore(Client client, int score)
          Updates the score of a client.
 void winGame(Client winner)
          Ends the Game and notifies the clients of the winner.
